item.title: Geri Halliwell - It's Raining Men
item.description:
작곡: P.Scha.., P.Jabara / 작사: Words & Music by
KY: 61028 / KY: 20040

Humidity’s
risin’
Barometer’s
getting low
According to
our sources
The street’s
the place to go
Cos tonight
for the first time
Just about
half past ten
For the first time
in history
It’s gonna start
raining men
It’s raining men-
hallelujah
It’s raining men-
amen
It’s raining men-
hallelujah
It’s raining men-
amen-

Humidity’s
raisin’
Barometer’s
getting low
According to
our sources
The street’s
the place to go
Cos tonight
for the first time
Just about
half past ten
For the first time
in history
It’s gonna start
raining men
It’s raining men-
hallelujah
It’s raining men- amen
I’m gonna go out
I’m gonna
let myself get
Absolutly
soaking wet
It’s raining men-
hallelujah
It’s raining men-
every specimen
Tall blonde
dark and lean
Rough and tough
and strong and mean
God bless
Mother Nature
She’s a
single woman too
She took
over heaven
And she did
what she had to do
She tought every Angel
to rearrange the sky
So that
each and every woman
Could find
the perfect guy
It’s raining men
(go get yourself wet
Girl
I know you want to!)
I feel stormy when
they’re movin’ in
I’ve got to begin
(I’ve got to begin)
Heaven on earth
don’t you loose
Your head
rip off the roof and
Stay in bed (rip off
the roof and stay)
It’s raining men-
hallelujah
It’s raining men-
amen

hallelujah
It’s raining men-
amen

hallelujah
